original_text: The Lord says: ‘Jacob's descendants, remember these things, because you, Israel, are my servant. I created you to be my servant. Israel, I will not forget you. The Lord says: ‘Jacob's descendants, remember these things, because you, Israel, are my servant. I created you to be my servant. Israel, I will not forget you. The Lord says:
korean_text: 야곱아 이스라엘아 이 일을 기억하라 너는 내 종이니라 내가 너를 지었으니 너는 내 종이니라 이스라엘아 너는 나에게 잊혀지지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: because you, Israel, are my servant
I created you to be my servant
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 나의 종이 되도록 창조했다

sentences.original_text: Israel, I will not forget you
because you, Israel, are my servant
I created you to be my servant
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 나의 종이 되도록 창조했다

sentences.original_text: Israel, I will not forget you
